mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no, l.lecture_time, l.lecture_starttime, l.lecture_endtime, l.lecture_day, l.classroom_no, s.subject_no, s.subject_name, s.subject_point, s.subject_grade, m.major_no, m.major_name FROM lecture l INNER JOIN subject s ON s.subject_no = l.subject_no INNER JOIN major m ON m.major_no = s.major_no ORDER BY l.lecture_no
